slides.title: Welcome to CPA BEC
slides.content:
# Business Environment & Concepts (BEC)

BEC covers **business operations** and **IT**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Governance** - Corporate structure
- **Economics** - Macroeconomics
- **Finance** - Corporate finance
- **IT** - Technology and controls

## Exam Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Governance | 17-27% |
| Economics | 17-27% |
| Finance | 11-21% |
| IT | 15-25% |
| Operations | 15-25% |

slides.title: Financial Management
slides.content:
# Corporate Finance

## Capital Budgeting

| Method | Criterion |
|--------|----------|
| NPV | > 0 |
| IRR | > Cost of capital |
| Payback | < Target |

## NPV Formula

```
NPV = Sum of [CF / (1+r)^n] - Investment
```

## WACC

```
WACC = (E/V x Ke) + (D/V x Kd)
```

slides.title: Working Capital
slides.content:
# Short-Term Finance

## Working Capital

```
NWC = Current Assets - Current Liabilities
```

## Cash Conversion Cycle

```
Days Inventory
+ Days Receivables
- Days Payables
= CCC
```

## Management Goals

- Minimize cash tied up
- Maintain liquidity
- Balance risk and return

slides.title: Cost Accounting
slides.content:
# Management Accounting

## Cost Classification

| Type | Behavior |
|------|----------|
| Fixed | Constant total |

## Variance Analysis

```
Material Usage: (AQ-SQ) x SP
Labor Rate: (AR-SR) x AH
Labor Efficiency: (AH-SH) x SR
```
